sentences.sentence: Rachel was quickly whisked away by her entourage.
sentences.translation: 雷切尔很快被她的随从带走了。

sentences.sentence: She travelled with an entourage of 60 and, so it is said, her own supplies of Irish stew.
sentences.translation: 她带了多达60个随从出行，据说还有爱尔兰炖肉。

sentences.sentence: None of the other Entourage cast was here.
sentences.translation: 《明星伙伴》剧组的其他成员并没有出现。
